GeneDef.Name: WVC_XenotypesAndGenes_GeneHiveMind_Base
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Affects all owners of any gene of the hive mind series. Psy-deaf pawns are ignored.
Efficiency of sync- depends on the size of the hive.

GeneDef.label: shared skills
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers. Due to which share some experience in skills.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, it synchronizes the skills.
Only the level is synchronized, experience is not affected.

GeneDef.label: shared thoughts
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers. Due to which they share some of their thoughts.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, it synchronizes the memories.
Only temporary memories are synchronized, permanent ones are not affected.
Allows to change the ideology of the entire mind to any desired one, at any time.

GeneDef.label: shared needs
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers. Due to which they share some of their needs.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, it synchronizes needs.
Only recreation, comfort, outdoors, indoors, beauty are synchronized.

GeneDef.label: shared opinion
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers. Thanks to this, they have a much better opinion of each other.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, the hive gets an opinion offset lasting about a day.
Affects the hive's opinion with the carrier and the carrier's opinion with the hive, without affecting the opinion between other pawns of the hive.
